TopicTitle: Would like to see a "Government Funding" mod

Articles.Content:
I envision this to be aimed more at the beginners than experienced players, although it could also be used to speed up the career cycle.

Essentially, once a month or so (Kerbal month, whatever that is), a set amount of funds would be deposited in the KSP account.

There could be specific levels (beginner, intermediate, hard) tied to the career path, or the ability to specify a set amount.

Anyone interested in doing something like this? I'd be happy to help test, etc.

There are already mods like this.

GovFunding: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/95865-CaelumIre-Technologies-%28CIT%29-General-Thread?p=1460619&viewfull=1#post1460619

maintenance costs, time scale for funds and amounts are all configurable by the user

There is at least one other mod, but I can't find it at the moment.
